Title: Unaired Pilot
Writer: Steven Moffat, Steven Moffat (creator), Mark Gatiss (creator), Arthur Conan Doyle (from the works of)
Actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Rupert Graves, Una Stubbs
Plot: Invalided home from the war in Afghanistan, Dr. John Watson becomes roommates with the world's only "consulting detective," Sherlock Holmes. Within a day their friendship is forged and several murders are solved.
